definition: to peel with a knife/to pare/to cut (a ball at tennis etc)

sentences.english: The exploiting class lusts for riches.
The exploiting classessystems should be abolished over the world.
sentences.chinese: 應該消滅世界上的一切剝削階級和剝削制度。

sentences.english: Such old ideology has been handed down by the exploiting classes over thousands of years.
sentences.chinese: 這些舊思想是剝削階級幾千年傳下來的。

sentences.english: We do heavily tax the exploiting classes.
sentences.chinese: 我們對剝削階級是狠狠地收稅的。

sentences.english: He used to belong to the exploited class.
sentences.chinese: 過去他屬於被剝削階級。

sentences.english: The exploiting classes as such have been eliminated in our country.
sentences.chinese: 在我國，剝削階級作爲階級已經消滅。

sentences.english: Achievement of common prosperity characterizes socialism, which cannot produce an exploiting class.
sentences.chinese: 社會主義特徵是搞集體富裕，它不產生剝削階級。

sentences.english: The exploiting classes and systems should be abolished over the world.
sentences.chinese: 應該消滅世界上的一切剝削階級和剝削制度。
